All Classes|All Packages

_

_AA - Variable in class elements.Camera
bolean value to determine anti aliasing
_apertureSize - Variable in class elements.Camera
the size of the aperture surface (located in the camera location), the size is relative to a single pixel, example: 1 = one pixel, and so on.
_axisRay - Variable in class geometries.Tube
_axisRay - direction ray of tube
_bb - Variable in class renderer.BasicRayTracer
boolean value to determine use of bounding box improvement
_boundingBox - Variable in class geometries.Container
every Intersectable composite have his bounding volume, which represented by a bounding box
_center - Variable in class geometries.Sphere
_center - the center point of the sphere
_containers - Variable in class geometries.Geometries
_containers - list of all components in the scene
_coord - Variable in class primitives.Coordinate
Coordinate value, intentionally "package-friendly" due to performance constraints
_dir - Variable in class primitives.Ray
_p0 - starting point of Ray
_direction - Variable in class elements.SpotLight
direction - the direction of the light focus - the narrowing factor, the beam gets narrower and weaker as it gets bigger.
_distance - Variable in class elements.Camera
object's actual distance from the camera center
_DOF - Variable in class elements.Camera
boolean value to set whether the camera has depth of field (bokeh) effect of not
_focalDistance - Variable in class elements.Camera
the distance between the camera's beginning location to the center of focal plane, forward vision becomes sharper in the distance, the more it's close to the focal plane (focal plane, the second imaginary plane, in which the beam rays emitted from the matching pixel in the view plane are passing through)
_focus - Variable in class elements.SpotLight
focus size
_head - Variable in class primitives.Vector
_head - the point the vector points to from (0,0,0)
_height - Variable in class elements.Camera
object's actual height
_height - Variable in class geometries.Cylinder
_height - the length of the cylinder from base to base
_name - Variable in class scene.Scene
_name - the point the vector points to from (0,0,0)
_normal - Variable in class geometries.Plane
_normal - normal to plane on q0
_numberOfRaysInAperture - Variable in class elements.Camera
number of rays in the focal plane of the camera (per pixel), the more rays in focal plane the more quality of the blurring
_numberOfRaysInPixel - Variable in class elements.Camera
number of rays in a single pixel for active super sampling
_p0 - Variable in class primitives.Ray
_dir - the point the Ray points to from p0
_P0 - Variable in class elements.Camera
_P0 - the camera location
_q0 - Variable in class geometries.Plane
_q0 - random point on plane
_radius - Variable in class geometries.RadialGeometry
_radius - the radius of the shape
_scene - Variable in class renderer.RayTracerBase
scene to be rendered
_Vright - Variable in class elements.Camera
Z axis vector
_Vto - Variable in class elements.Camera
X axis vector
_Vup - Variable in class elements.Camera
_Vup - Y axis vector
_width - Variable in class elements.Camera
object's actual width
_x - Variable in class primitives.Point3D
_x - the coordinate on x pivot
_xMax - Variable in class geometries.BoundingBox
xMax - the maximum value of X coordinate of this bounding box
_xMin - Variable in class geometries.BoundingBox
_xMin - the minimum value of X coordinate of this bounding box
_y - Variable in class primitives.Point3D
_y - the coordinate on y pivot
_yMax - Variable in class geometries.BoundingBox
_yMax - the maximum value of Y coordinate of this bounding box
_yMin - Variable in class geometries.BoundingBox
_yMin - the minimum value of Y coordinate of this bounding box
_z - Variable in class primitives.Point3D
_z - the coordinate on z pivot
_zMax - Variable in class geometries.BoundingBox
_zMax - the maximum value of Z coordinate of this bounding box
_zMin - Variable in class geometries.BoundingBox
_zMin - the minimum value of Z coordinate of this bounding box
